description: Agrosolidaria Charalá is a grassroots community organization focused on rural development and sustainable agriculture in Colombia. Established in the early 2000s, it aims to support local communities through various initiatives, including agri-food production, health, and education. The organization emphasizes self-management and collaboration, fostering relationships between producers and consumers to enhance food sustainability. By integrating environmental education and knowledge management, Agrosolidaria seeks to empower communities and promote a holistic approach to development.
name: Agrosolidaria Charalá
